page.title: 06Family 2 Shobdon and Byton
page.content:
The total figures collected show that in the families interviewed there were{151 adults and 117 children.
22 children were above school age 40 children were primary school age 38 children were secondary school age 17 children were below school age
Of the{40 children at primary school;
37 attended Shobdon Primary School, 2 attended a school 3 miles away and 1 attended a private school just out of the area. Of the{38 children at secondary school
31 attended the area school at Wigmore ( 6 miles to the North ) 5 living in the Byton area went to Presteigne ( 4 miles West ) 2 went to Leominster (6 miles East)
